explanation: The final check used `if grid[h][w]:` which tests the truthiness of the string in that cell — non-empty strings are always True — so the program would (incorrectly) print 'Yes' whenever the bottom-right cell contains any character. The intent is to check whether that cell was reached by the search, i.e. whether the visited array `bool` is True at (h,w). I fixed the single incorrect line to `if bool[h][w]:` so the program correctly reports reachability.
